questions.onset: When did the confusion or altered mental status start?
questions.level_of_consciousness: Is the person alert, confused, drowsy, or unresponsive?
questions.recent_trauma: Has there been any recent head injury or trauma?
questions.medical_history: Do you have diabetes, seizure disorder, or other medical conditions?
questions.medications: What medications are you currently taking?
questions.associated_symptoms: Are there any other symptoms like fever, headache, weakness, or difficulty speaking?

triage_rules.reason: Decreased level of consciousness - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Altered mental status after trauma - Possible head injury - Emergency evaluation needed
Confusion with fever - Possible meningitis or encephalitis - Emergency care required
